p.s: The news papernewspaper article Is the usefulness of unions coming to an end? The answer is yes, written by Brian Pollard and published in The Gulf News on 24 November 2011 is about the evulationevolution of unions.
Pollard starts the text with a short part about the past of unions and how they were mentmeant to be.
He let the unions stand in a favourable light while explaining how the unions brought essential changes for workers.

In the following parts he tells how his opinion about unions has changed over the years, he is giving reasons for that by saying that todaystoday's unions are no longer about the protection of the workers, no longer required to ensure that workers have good conditions.
Instead he reveals that unions are looking for power and not anymore for fairness even though that was the reason why thethey were created, to keep fairness.
At the end he forces the government to take care and pay attention to that topic, because unions are already useless - Brian Pollard.
